metadata.title: CVE-2023-29533 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A website could have obscured the fullscreen notification by using acombination of window.open, fullscreen requests,window.name assignments, and setInterval calls.This could have led to user confusion and possible spoofing attacks. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 112, Focus for Android < 112, Firefox ESR <102.10, Firefox for Android < 112, and Thunderbird < 102.10.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
